io.straas.android.sdk.circall.exception

Interface CircallException


  • public interface CircallException

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CircallException.CameraSwitchErrorException
      Camera switch error, maybe permission problem or other camera problems.
      static class  CircallException.CancelledException
      Current task is cancelled by developer.
      static class  CircallException.InternalException
      Internal error occurs.
      static class  CircallException.InterruptedException
      Current task is interrupted by developer.
      static class  CircallException.InvalidTokenException
      The CirCall token is invalid, maybe it's wrong or expired.
      static class  CircallException.InvalidVideoFrameException
      The CircallStream to capture snapshot is invalid, maybe video CircallStream or CircallPlayerView is invalid or not ready.
      static class  CircallException.NetworkException
      Couldn't connect to server.
      static class  CircallException.PermissionDeniedException
      This task is not permitted by server since what you want to do is not allowed here.
      static class  CircallException.PublishStreamException
      Called when a streaming error occurs in local CircallStream, maybe local streaming data path is lost or streaming connection is disconnected suddenly.
      static class  CircallException.RequestRejectedException
      This occurs when developer is trying to invoke a method with wrong parameter causing IllegalArgumentException or calling a method in wrong state causing IllegalStateException.
      static class  CircallException.ServerException
      An error occurs on server side.
      static class  CircallException.SubscribeStreamException
      Called when a streaming error occurs in remote CircallStream, maybe remote streaming data path is lost or streaming connection is disconnected suddenly.
      static class  CircallException.UnauthorizedException
      The user is unauthorized.
      static class  CircallException.UnexpectedCircallApiResponse
      Received unexpected CirCall API response.
